text: [APPLAUSE]

Hi, I'm Allison Campbell,
and we're Zubale.

Zubale is a platform
that empowers

brands to crowdsource
intelligence and take action

to improve their business
in emerging markets.

Brands are blind in emerging
markets for three reasons.

First, the supply chain
is highly fragmented.

Second, the majority of
transactions are done in cash.

And third, brands
hire agencies that

are slow and expensive to
send thousands of people
to point of sale.

Today, smartphone penetration is
skyrocketing around the world.

Millions of people
now have a smartphone.

So Zubale is a solution that
connects brands directly

with companies to be
able to crowdsource jobs,

things like stocking the
shelf, building displays,
checking prices.

So the brand's business
improves and the user

can earn rewards
via their phone.

Since we've launched
in five months,

we've completed over
100,000 jobs for brands.

And we have six market
leading customers and hundreds
in the pipeline.

I wanted to tell you about
one of our users, Daniella.

Daniella, in the
month of January,
completed 140 jobs in 30 days.

She would come home from work,
run from 7-Eleven to 7-Eleven

checking prices, and got
her friends involved.
She earned $1,000.

So for Daniela,
and millions more,

Zubale is a platform to
connect to the digital economy

and use their phone
to earn rewards.
Zubale means rise up.

And I invite you to join us as
we connect brands to billions.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
